title: Burden of disease and costs for the Unified Health System in Brazil due to diseases whose alcohol consumption is a necessary cause: an ecological study
content:
Publication date: October 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 235

Author(s): A.S.F. Vegi, A.C. Costa, L.F.F. Guedes, M.S. Felisbino-Mendes, D.C. Malta, I.E. Machado
